mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Miles City Rollaway", "Let 'Er Go", "Ragging the Call" ROUND DANCES "Jeannine" and "Anniversary Progressive Two-Step" SPECIAL FEATURES "We Get our 2 Cents Worth", "Style: Glimpses of 'Pass-Thru' Family", "San Diego's First Lady of Squares and Rounds", "Asilomar, 1954 - 'The Best Yet'", "Musical Notations and Rhythms". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square of the Month", "On the Record", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
